entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cache Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:46 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.4°C

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm near Kamloops. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm near Kamloops. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
